title: Just PESU things.....!!
content: They ask us to pay fu*king 5.10L before getting the seat. WTF....??

comments.body: what happens if we dont take the seat though???
Nah this is dum asf. What kind of college even does that? Fuck off
'2029 juniors having their first "Welcome to PES" moment, love to see it
Ain't joining pes after reading also the stuff on reddit ðŸ˜­ðŸ˜­
Understandable.
Only thing I found best about pes were placements

Ngl, that's all PES has going for it at the moment, apart from the crowd and alumni network.

If all you care about is a decent job at the end of 4 years, this place will do its job. But nothing more. But then, you wouldn't be paying 5L+/year for that unless you are *extremely* well off.

Rvce>Manipal>Pes>Comedk colleges
Is this a correct ranking?
The top 3 do not have much difference among them, but yeah I guess you could say that is fairly accurate. Its been a while since I went through this process, so I am not the right person to answer.

I think you lose 10k. That was the process for management seat.
This is atrocious though!!!!

It really doesn't matter much. 

I'd say rvce=manippal=pes=remaining 2-3 top comedk colleges(bms, msrit, maybe another I'm missing) >the rest of the comedk colleges. 

Most colleges in the same "tier" will give you roughly the same opportunities. It really depends on the students themselves after that.
Pes is still better than most colleges in banglore right.. Like top 3 in banglore

On top of that worst admission management they did a glitch with my rank messed up the internal ranking and now not picking calls and responding to emails 

Plus the mod doesn't even approve the posts I don't know what flair and what they are asking me to
Any posts asking for advice on JEE rank will be deleted. If you were trying to post anything else, then DM the mods.
Mod is the office close today ? They did a glitch with my rank because of which the ranking given by pesu is affected. They're not responding on mail and not picking calls
Not sure. Try calling them if you haven't emailed yet, or if you live in Bangalore, visit the campus and get it sorted. Someone else also spoke about a glitch in another thread.

There is an option to change rank but I'm not sure was it yesterday too, and if I do that will they release a new ranklist

I have emailed them yesterday as well as a follow up today no response and I'm not from karnataka

Other than rvce and iiitb 
Pes is way better than the rest. 
The gap btw rvce and pes is not that much now.

That's pretty standard.
I lost money on manipal like that.
When tf did the fees go up to 5.1L lmao?!
Yes bruuhh. For students who are joining through jee have fee of 5.1L for Cse and 4.1L for ECE and other courses
Bro please check my recent post
where would u keep thapar ? in same tier or below ? bcz im getting a seat at thapar in ECE and idk if i will get ECE here
placement wise yes but if u want more college life then manipal>pes>rv ( as what i have seen)
Just wait for it , u will see what all this college can do
Same
Why do they need to create a mess? Can't it be kept simple

Got a rank of 1.3L in mains 
Will I get a seat by any chance? 
As I saw on siksha web last year's cse closing rank was 2.3L something...plz help
you can get ec campus with cse but idts you can get rr campus cause last year the cut off was around 1000 pes rank
Pess jee rank cards are out . My brother got 2k . Will he be able to get cse?
I havenâ€™t receive this mail but got the rank card. What should I do?
Could you share?
